questiontext.text: Five tennis balls in a box have diameters 62, 63, 64, 64 and 65 mm, respectively. What is the mean and standard deviation of this population?

answer.text: The mean is 2.5 and the standard deviation is 1.

feedback.text: The mean is 2.5 and the standard deviation is 1.:Incorrect

answer.text: The mean is 63 and the standard deviation is 1.

feedback.text: The mean is 63 and the standard deviation is 1.:Incorrect

answer.text: The mean is 63.6 and the standard deviation is 1.02.

feedback.text: The mean is 63.6 and the standard deviation is 1.02.: Correct

answer.text: The mean is 64 and the standard deviation is 1.

feedback.text: The mean is 64 and the standard deviation is 1.: Incorrect
